name: cryptocurrency-icons
description: A set of icons for all the main cryptocurrencies and altcoins, in a range of styles and sizes.

scripts.minify-images:32: npm run minify-images:32:black && npm run minify-images:32:color && npm run minify-images:32:icon && npm run minify-images:32:white
scripts.minify-images:128: npm run minify-images:128:black && npm run minify-images:128:color && npm run minify-images:128:icon && npm run minify-images:128:white
scripts.minify-images:svg: npm run minify-images:svg:black && npm run minify-images:svg:color && npm run minify-images:svg:icon && npm run minify-images:svg:white
scripts.minify-images: npm run minify-images:32 && npm run minify-images:128 && npm run minify-images:svg
scripts.imacss:32:black: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/32/black/*' blank_option crypto-icon-32-black > build/32/black.css
scripts.imacss:32:color: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/32/color/*' blank_option crypto-icon-32-color > build/32/color.css
scripts.imacss:32:icon: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/32/icon/*' blank_option crypto-icon-32-icon > build/32/icon.css
scripts.imacss:32:white: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/32/white/*' blank_option crypto-icon-32-white > build/32/white.css
scripts.imacss:32: npm run imacss:32:black && npm run imacss:32:color && npm run imacss:32:icon && npm run imacss:32:white
scripts.imacss:128:black: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/128/black/*' blank_option crypto-icon-128-black > build/128/black.css
scripts.imacss:128:color: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/128/color/*' blank_option crypto-icon-128-color > build/128/color.css
scripts.imacss:128:icon: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/128/icon/*' blank_option crypto-icon-128-icon > build/128/icon.css
scripts.imacss:128:white: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/128/white/*' blank_option crypto-icon-128-white > build/128/white.css
scripts.imacss:128: npm run imacss:128:black && npm run imacss:128:color && npm run imacss:128:icon && npm run imacss:128:white
scripts.imacss:svg:black: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/svg/black/*' blank_option crypto-icon-svg-black > build/svg/black.css
scripts.imacss:svg:color: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/svg/color/*' blank_option crypto-icon-svg-color > build/svg/color.css
scripts.imacss:svg:icon: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/svg/icon/*' blank_option crypto-icon-svg-icon > build/svg/icon.css
scripts.imacss:svg:white: mkdirp dist && imacss 'build/svg/white/*' blank_option crypto-icon-svg-white > build/svg/white.css
scripts.imacss:svg: npm run imacss:svg:black && npm run imacss:svg:color && npm run imacss:svg:icon && npm run imacss:svg:white
scripts.imacss: npm run imacss:32 && npm run imacss:128 && npm run imacss:svg
scripts.svgstore: npm run svgstore:black && npm run svgstore:color && npm run svgstore:icon && npm run svgstore:white
scripts.build: npm run minify-images && npm run imacss && npm run svgstore
